short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DevDesk is a Chrome extension that allows you to supercharge effectivity in Zendesk tickets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Program that adds certain keybindings to ZenDesk:

Ctrl + S - Save ticket with selected status
Ctrl + O - Save ticket as Open
Ctrl + P - Save ticket as Pending
Ctrl + H - Save ticket as Hold
Ctrl + Alt + S - Save ticket as Solved

Ctrl + C- Copy ticket number to clipboard
Alt + C - Copy ticket URL to clipboard

Alt + T - Toggle script on/off
Alt + H - Show help modal
